To those of you not understanding the crack, and to those who do it wrong and run into a requiring of a registration code...

It's very simple, install the program, dont run it at once. 
Find the directory where the program is installed, open the dll directory. 
In there is a file called ALL.DLL, similar to the one in the crack directory wich followed with the download. 
Delete the ALL.DLL file in the DLL directory, and add the one from the crack directory instead.

Now the program should run with no problem.
